welcomePage.title: Eclipse Modeling Framework (EMF)
welcomePage.intro: EMF is a Java/XML framework for generating tools and other applications based on simple class models.
welcomePage.item: What is EMF? Read the overview article to learn about EMF. Then, follow the tutorial to see how easy it is to generate a model.
Learn More This is the official site of EMF: http://www.eclipse.org/emf
